name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-angular-migration
title: Migrating existing Angular applications to SharePoint Framework sample
shortDescription: This is a sample Angular application before and after it has been migrated to a SharePoint Framework client-side web part.
longDescription: This is a sample Angular application before and after it has been migrated to a SharePoint Framework client-side web part.

thumbnails.alt: Migrating existing Angular applications to SharePoint Framework sample
Migrating existing Angular applications to SharePoint Framework sample

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
